name: Garden Jam
description:
Game Info

Garden Jam is a simple gardening game with one twist, everything grows super fast.

  Instructions

To survive, you must meet the due payment in time. You money is on the bar at the top, there is a payment amount in red and the due time is to the right of the red numbers. To plant a crop, you must spend a certain amount of money, you will earn it back and some more. To sell crops, wait till the 4th or 5th phase (should be obvious, but that needs working on), then right click them.

Note - If the size of the background looks strange, that's cause the game doesn't really work on different resolutions. 

  Controls

Left Click - Select and Plant

Right Click - Sell Plant

  Credits

Music - Benjamin S.

Everything else - LiveDieRespwn
